info.summary:
Amelie Cordier works as a Associate Professor in Laboratoire d'InfoRmatique en Image et Systèmes d'information, and his\her h-index is 12, g-index is 19. His\Her interests are :
 Case Based Reasoning; Adaptation Knowledge; Case-based Reasoning; Case Base Reasoning; Semantic Wiki;
